features.name: Instagram service health check
features.description: GET /health returns 200 with status=ok for Instagram service

features.name: Instagram response time < 2s
features.description: Health endpoint responds within 2000ms

features.name: Instagram CORS headers present
features.description: Response includes Access-Control-Allow-Origin header

features.name: Instagram service version returned
features.description: Health response includes service version string

features.name: Instagram uptime reported
features.description: Health response includes uptime or started_at field

features.name: Instagram valid auth token accepted
features.description: Request with valid Bearer token returns 200, not 401

features.name: Instagram missing auth returns 401
features.description: Request without Authorization header returns 401

features.name: Instagram invalid token returns 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer invalid' returns 401

features.name: Instagram malformed Bearer returns 400 or 401
features.description: Request with 'Bearer ' (empty) returns 4xx

features.name: Instagram token in query param rejected
features.description: Token passed as ?token= without Bearer header is rejected

features.name: Instagram auth error body has message field
features.description: 401 response body includes message or error field

features.name: Instagram OPTIONS preflight passes without auth
features.description: OPTIONS request returns 200 without auth header

features.name: Instagram auth bypass attempt blocked
features.description: Request with X-Forwarded-For spoofing returns same 401

features.name: Send DM to valid recipient
features.description: POST /api/instagram/dm/send with valid username + message returns success=true

features.name: Send DM to non-existent user returns error
features.description: POST /api/instagram/dm/send with fake username returns success=false with error field

features.name: Get conversation list
features.description: GET /api/instagram/dm/conversations returns array of conversation objects

features.name: Get messages in conversation
features.description: GET /api/instagram/dm/messages/:id returns message array with author+content

features.name: Post comment on valid post URL
features.description: POST /api/instagram/comments/post with valid postUrl + text returns commentId

features.name: Post comment on invalid URL returns error
features.description: POST /api/instagram/comments/post with invalid URL returns success=false

features.name: Get comments from post
features.description: GET /api/instagram/comments/:postUrl returns comments array

features.name: DM send respects message length limit
features.description: Message > 1000 chars is either truncated or rejected with clear error

features.name: Get own profile info
features.description: GET /api/instagram/profile returns handle, follower_count, following_count

features.name: Navigate to profile in browser
features.description: POST /api/instagram/navigate with valid username opens profile

features.name: Get DM rate limit status
features.description: GET /api/instagram/dm/rate-limits returns daily_sent, daily_limit, reset_at

features.name: Get comment rate limit status
features.description: GET /api/instagram/comments/rate-limits returns current rate limit state

features.name: Batch get conversation previews
features.description: GET /api/instagram/dm/conversations?limit=10 returns exactly 10 or fewer

features.name: Send DM with emoji
features.description: POST /api/instagram/dm/send with emoji in message succeeds

features.name: DM send dry-run mode
features.description: POST /api/instagram/dm/send with dry_run=true returns simulated success without sending

features.name: Comment with hashtag
features.description: POST /api/instagram/comments/post with #hashtag in text succeeds

features.name: Get unread DM count
features.description: GET /api/instagram/dm/unread returns integer count >= 0

features.name: Mark conversation as read
features.description: POST /api/instagram/dm/conversations/:id/read returns success=true

features.name: Get suggested replies for message
features.description: POST /api/instagram/dm/suggest-reply with message returns suggestions array

features.name: Archive conversation
features.description: POST /api/instagram/dm/conversations/:id/archive returns success=true

features.name: Instagram missing required body field returns 400
features.description: POST without required field returns 400 with field name in error

features.name: Instagram empty string body returns 400
features.description: POST with empty string for required text field returns 400

features.name: Instagram null value in required field returns 400
features.description: POST with null for required field returns 400 with message

features.name: Instagram wrong content-type returns 415 or 400
features.description: POST with text/plain instead of application/json returns 4xx

features.name: Instagram extremely long string (>10000 chars) handled
features.description: POST with 10001 char string returns 400 or truncates gracefully

features.name: Instagram SQL injection attempt in text field rejected
features.description: Text containing SQL keywords is sanitized, not executed

features.name: Instagram XSS payload in text field is escaped
features.description: Text with <script> tags is returned safely escaped

features.name: Instagram service down → 503 or circuit open
features.description: When downstream unavailable, returns 503 with retry-after header

features.name: Instagram timeout returns 504 with message
features.description: Request that takes >30s returns 504 gateway timeout

features.name: Instagram duplicate action returns idempotent result
features.description: Sending same DM twice returns success without duplicate

features.name: Instagram invalid enum value in body returns 400
features.description: POST with platform='invalid' returns 400 listing valid values

features.name: Instagram error response always JSON
features.description: All 4xx/5xx responses have Content-Type: application/json

features.name: Instagram stack trace not exposed in production
features.description: 500 error response does NOT include stack trace

features.name: Instagram connection refused returns retryable error
features.description: When port not available, error includes retryable=true flag

features.name: Instagram method not allowed returns 405
features.description: GET on POST-only endpoint returns 405 with Allow header

features.name: Instagram unicode emoji in payload works
features.description: Unicode emoji 😀🔥 in text field is preserved

features.name: Instagram RTL text (Arabic/Hebrew) handled
features.description: Arabic text in body is returned correctly

features.name: Instagram newline chars in text preserved
features.description: Text with \n is stored and returned with newlines intact

features.name: Instagram zero-width space character handled
features.description: Text with zero-width space doesn't crash processing

features.name: Instagram URL with query params in text preserved
features.description: URL with ? and & in text is not altered

features.name: Instagram very short text (1 char) works
features.description: Single character text in body accepted

features.name: Instagram duplicate consecutive spaces normalized
features.description: Multiple spaces in text handled without error

features.name: Instagram numeric username as string works
features.description: Username '123456' as string is accepted

features.name: Instagram pagination limit=0 returns empty or default
features.description: limit=0 returns empty array or default page

features.name: Instagram pagination page=9999 returns empty array
features.description: Out-of-range page returns empty array, not 404

features.name: Instagram rate limit headers present on responses
features.description: Response includes X-RateLimit-Limit and X-RateLimit-Remaining

features.name: Instagram 429 returned when limit exceeded
features.description: Exceeding configured rate limit returns 429 with Retry-After

features.name: Instagram Retry-After header is integer seconds
features.description: Retry-After value is parseable integer > 0

features.name: Instagram rate limit resets after window
features.description: After wait period, subsequent requests succeed again

features.name: Instagram concurrent requests handled safely
features.description: 5 simultaneous requests don't cause 500 errors

features.name: Instagram daily cap tracked per account
features.description: GET /rate-limits returns per-account daily_used field

features.name: Instagram force=true bypasses active-hours guard
features.description: POST with force=true during inactive hours still processes

features.name: Instagram DM/action stored in Supabase
features.description: After successful action, row appears in relevant Supabase table

features.name: Instagram no duplicate rows on retry
features.description: Retrying same action doesn't create duplicate DB row

features.name: Instagram timestamps are ISO 8601
features.description: created_at column in stored rows is valid ISO 8601 string

features.name: Instagram platform field set correctly
features.description: Stored row has platform field set to correct platform name

features.name: Instagram contact upserted in crm_contacts
features.description: New user interaction upserts record in crm_contacts table

features.name: Instagram conversation synced to crm_conversations
features.description: Conversation appears in crm_conversations after DM sync

features.name: Instagram message synced to crm_messages
features.description: Individual messages appear in crm_messages after sync

features.name: Instagram RLS policy allows service reads
features.description: Supabase SELECT with service role key succeeds

features.name: Instagram SELECT returns rows with all required columns
features.description: Query result includes id, created_at, platform, content

features.name: Instagram failed action NOT stored
features.description: When action fails (success=false), no row is inserted

features.name: Instagram AI message generation returns string
features.description: POST /ai-message or /suggest-reply returns non-empty string

features.name: Instagram AI output respects platform char limit
features.description: AI-generated text for this platform fits platform char limit

features.name: Instagram AI model field returned in response
features.description: AI response includes model_used field

features.name: Instagram AI error falls back gracefully
features.description: When Claude API fails, returns fallback text or 503

features.name: Instagram AI output is on-topic for niche
features.description: Generated message for solopreneur niche mentions relevant terms

features.name: Instagram AI scoring returns 0-100 integer
features.description: Prospect/content score is integer in [0, 100] range

features.name: Instagram AI reasoning field non-empty
features.description: Score response includes non-empty reasoning or signals array

features.name: Instagram AI structured output is valid JSON
features.description: When model returns structured JSON, it parses without error

features.name: Instagram MCP initialize handshake completes
features.description: Send initialize → receive result with protocolVersion

features.name: Instagram tools/list returns valid schema array
features.description: Each tool has name, description, inputSchema fields

features.name: Instagram tool call returns result content array
features.description: Valid tool call returns result.content[] with type field

features.name: Instagram tool error returns structured error
features.description: Invalid tool params returns isError=true with message

features.name: Instagram MCP over stdio doesn't crash on empty line
features.description: Empty newline in stdio stream doesn't crash server

features.name: Instagram tool result is serializable JSON
features.description: Tool result can be JSON.stringify'd without circular refs

features.name: Instagram sequential tool calls maintain session
features.description: Call tool A then tool B in same session — both succeed

features.name: Instagram unknown tool returns method-not-found
features.description: Call with unknown toolName returns -32601 or error

features.name: Instagram tool timeout returns error gracefully
features.description: Tool that takes >30s returns timeout error, not hang

features.name: Instagram MCP server restarts cleanly after crash
features.description: After killing and restarting, first tool call succeeds

features.name: Instagram session created with unique ID
features.description: Create session returns unique sessionId string

features.name: Instagram session persists between requests
features.description: Two requests with same sessionId share browser state

features.name: Instagram expired session returns 404
features.description: Request with old/expired sessionId returns 404 or error

features.name: Instagram close session frees resources
features.description: Close session endpoint confirms session removed

features.name: Instagram list sessions returns active sessions
features.description: List sessions returns currently active session IDs

features.name: Instagram p95 response time < 5s for core ops
features.description: 95th percentile of 20 sequential calls is under 5000ms

features.name: Instagram 10 concurrent requests all succeed
features.description: 10 simultaneous requests return 200 with no 500 errors

features.name: Instagram large payload (50 items) handled
features.description: Response with 50+ items in array is returned correctly

features.name: Instagram streaming response works if supported
features.description: If SSE/streaming supported, first chunk received within 2s

features.name: Instagram cold start after idle < 10s
features.description: First request after 5min idle returns within 10s
